name: Ball AR
description: Ball AR is a augmented reality basketball game where the player can play with or against bots in different game modes. There are three game modes. First is Shootaround mode, here is where the player and other bots can shoot around in a open gym to work on your shot. Next mode is Game of X, this is like a horse but you decided on what your going to. The game can be set anywhere from 1 to 10. Last mode is 3 Point Shootout, This is where the player will go up against one of the bots in a 3 point contest to see who can make the most shots in a given time. There is also customization for the balls and also you can select the court you can play at.
